bill.summary:
Medical Testing Availability Act of 2015
This bill amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to prohibit a product labeled for research use only from being deemed adulterated or misbranded on the basis that its manufacturer or distributor: (1) sells the product to an end user who uses the product for a purpose other than research, or (2) engages in business communications with an end user regarding the product.
